title: Postman
body: Chaminda Maama, is the postman, living in the friendly neighborhood of a quaint picturesque little town bordering the city of Colombo known as Piliyandala. Like most town heroes, who dedicate their lives to public service for decades was no different; pedaling his way cheerily, through every street corner knocking on doors or ringing the bell to announcing his arrival to delive letters and packages that is anticipated as ones daily routine in every home or business.
